languages.text: У великого стратега есть набор ключевых {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} — {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Стратегический план{/g}: {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}передовая{/g}, {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}вторая линия{/g} и {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}тыл{/g}. Все они позволяют размечать функциональные зоны на поле боя, с которыми взаимодействуют остальные способности великого стратега, давая различные {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} союзникам и {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафы{/g} врагам. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} великого стратега применяется к одной из зон. Каждый союзник, находящийся в этой зоне в начале следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} великого стратега, получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, прежде чем великий стратег начнет действовать. Количество предоставляемых ОД увеличивается на 1 (до 3), а количество ОП — на 2 (до 6) за каждого врага, убитого в этой зоне с момента применения героического акта до начала дополнительных ходов. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} великого стратега: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} великого стратега: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Коммерция{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Взрывотехника{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Логика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Техника{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Знание: Империум{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Знание: Ксеносы{/g}.

Grand Strategists have a set of keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} categorised as {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g}: {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Frontline{/g}, {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Backline{/g}, and {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Rear{/g}. Each of these designates an area of the battlefield that will have specific interactions with the rest of the Grand Strategist's abilities, while also granting various {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to allies and imposing {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} on enemies. The Grand Strategist can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} on one of these areas. At the start of the Grand Strategist's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each ally who is in the area when this turn begins gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. For every enemy who is killed in the area between when the heroic act is used and when the extra turns begin, the number of AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6). Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}.
languages.original_text: У стратега есть набор ключевых способностей — Стратегический план: передовая, вторая линия и тыл. Все они позволяют размечать функциональные зоны на поле боя, с которыми взаимодействуют остальные способности стратега, давая различные бонусы союзникам и штрафы врагам. Героический акт стратега применяется к одной из зон. Каждый союзник, находящийся в этой зоне в начале следующего хода стратега, получает дополнительный ход с 1 ОД и 2 ОП, прежде чем стратег начнет действовать. Количество предоставляемых ОД увеличивается на 1 (до 3), а количество ОП — на 2 (до 6) за каждого врага, убитого в этой зоне с момента применения героического акта до начала дополнительных ходов. Важные характеристики стратега: Общительность, Интеллект, Восприятие, Воля. Навыки стратега: Убеждение, Коммерция, Взрывотехника, Логика, Техника, Знание: Империум, Знание: Ксеносы.

traits.locale_text: Strategists have a set of keystone abilities categorised as Combat Tactics: Frontline, Backline, and Rear. Each of these designates an area of the battlefield that will have specific interactions with the rest of the Strategist's abilities and grant various bonuses to allies and impose penalties on enemies. The Strategist can use their heroic act on one of these areas. At the start of the Strategist's next turn, each ally who is in the area when this turn begins gains an extra turn with 1 AP and 2 MP. For every enemy who is killed in the area between when the heroic act is used and when the extra turns begin, the number of AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up a to maximum of 6). Key characteristics: Fellowship, Intelligence, Perception, Willpower. Skills: Persuasion, Commerce, Demolition, Logic, Tech-Use, Lore (Imperium), Lore (Xenos).

Strategists have a set of keystone abilities categorised as Combat Tactics: Frontline, Backline, and Rear. Each of these designates an area of the battlefield that will have specific interactions with the rest of the Strategist's abilities and grant various bonuses to allies and impose penalties on enemies. The Strategist can use their heroic act on one of these areas. At the start of the Strategist's next turn, each ally who is in the area when this turn begins gains an extra turn with 1 AP and 2 MP. For every enemy who is killed in the area between when the heroic act is used and when the extra turns begin, the number of AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up a to maximum of 6). Key characteristics: Fellowship, Intelligence, Perception, Willpower. Skills: Persuasion, Commerce, Demolition, Logic, Tech-Use, Lore (Imperium), Lore (Xenos).

Strategists have a set of keystone abilities categorised as Combat Tactics: Frontline, Backline, and Rear. Each of these designates an area of the battlefield that will have specific interactions with the rest of the Strategist's abilities, while also granting various bonuses to allies and imposing penalties on enemies. The Strategist can use their heroic act on one of these areas. At the start of the Strategist's next turn, each ally who is in the area when this turn begins gains an extra turn with 1 AP and 2 MP. For every enemy who is killed in the area between when the heroic act is used and when the extra turns begin, the number of AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6). Key characteristics: Fellowship, Intelligence, Perception, Willpower. Skills: Persuasion, Commerce, Demolition, Logic, Tech-Use, Lore (Imperium), Lore (Xenos).

Grand Strategists have a set of keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} categorised as Combat Tactics: Frontline, Backline, and Rear. Each of these designates an area of the battlefield that will have specific interactions with the rest of the Grand Strategist's abilities, while also granting various {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to allies and imposing {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} on enemies. The Grand Strategist can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} on one of these areas. At the start of the Grand Strategist's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each ally who is in the area when this turn begins gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. For every enemy who is killed in the area between when the heroic act is used and when the extra turns begin, the number of AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6). Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}.

Grand Strategists have a set of keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} categorised as Combat Tactics: Frontline, Backline, and Rear. Each of these designates an area of the battlefield that will have specific interactions with the rest of the Grand Strategist's abilities, while also granting various {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to allies and imposing {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} on enemies. The Grand Strategist can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} on one of these areas. At the start of the Grand Strategist's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each ally who is in the area when this turn begins gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. For every enemy who is killed in the area between when the heroic act is used and when the extra turns begin, the number of AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6). Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}.

languages.text: Großstrategen haben einen Satz an wesentlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}, die als Gefechtstaktiken: Frontlinie, Abwehrlinie und Nachhut kategorisiert werden. Jede von ihnen bezeichnet einen Bereich des Schlachtfeldes, der bestimmte Interaktionen mit den restlichen Fähigkeiten des Großstrategen aufweist und gleichzeitig Verbündeten verschiedene {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} gewährt und Feinden {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzüge{/g} verhängt. Der Großstrategen kann seine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} auf einen dieser Bereiche anwenden. Zu Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Großstrategen erhält jeder zu Beginn des Zugs in dem Bereich befindliche Verbündete einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}. Für jeden Feind, der zwischen dem Einsatzzeitpunkt der Heldentat und dem Beginn des zusätzlichen Zugs in dem Bereich getötet wird, erhöht sich die Anzahl der AP um +1 (bis um maximal 3) und der BP um +2 (bis um maximal 6). {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Schlüsseleigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Handel{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Zerstörung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Einsatz{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Wissen (Xenos){/g}.

The Grand Strategist can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} on one of these areas. At the start of the Grand Strategist's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each ally who is in the area when this turn begins gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. For every enemy who is killed in the area between when the heroic act is used and when the extra turns begin, the number of AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6). Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}.

traits.locale_text: Großstrategen haben einen Satz an wesentlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}, die als {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Gefechtstaktiken{/g}: {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Frontlinie{/g}, {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Abwehrlinie{/g} und {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Nachhut{/g} kategorisiert werden. Jede von ihnen bezeichnet einen Bereich des Schlachtfeldes, der bestimmte Interaktionen mit den restlichen Fähigkeiten des Großstrategen aufweist und gleichzeitig Verbündeten verschiedene {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} gewährt und Feinden {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzüge{/g} verhängt. Der Großstrategen kann seine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} auf einen dieser Bereiche anwenden. Zu Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Großstrategen erhält jeder zu Beginn des Zugs in dem Bereich befindliche Verbündete einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}. Für jeden Feind, der zwischen dem Einsatzzeitpunkt der Heldentat und dem Beginn des zusätzlichen Zugs in dem Bereich getötet wird, erhöht sich die Anzahl der AP um +1 (bis um maximal 3) und der BP um +2 (bis um maximal 6). {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Schlüsseleigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Handel{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Zerstörung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Einsatz{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Wissen (Xenos){/g}.

languages.text: Les grands stratèges disposent de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} clés classées en {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tactiques de combat{/g} : {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Ligne de front{/g}, {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Ligne de fond{/g} et {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Zone arrière{/g}. Chacune d'entre elles désigne une partie du champ de bataille qui présentera des interactions spécifiques avec les autres capacités du grand stratège, tout en conférant divers {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} aux alliés et en imposant des {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g} aux ennemis. Le grand stratège peut utiliser son {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} dans l'une de ces zones. Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du grand stratège, chaque allié situé dans la zone bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} et 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. Pour chaque ennemi éliminé dans la zone entre le moment où l'acte héroïque est utilisé et le moment où les tours supplémentaires commencent, le nombre de PA augmente de +1 (jusqu'à un maximum de 3) et le nombre de PD de +2 (jusqu'à un maximum de 6). {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logique{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Technomaîtrise{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Connaissance (Xénos){/g}.
languages.original_text: Grand Strategists have a set of keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} categorised as {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g}: {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Frontline{/g}, {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Backline{/g}, and {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Rear{/g}. Each of these designates an area of the battlefield that will have specific interactions with the rest of the Grand Strategist's abilities, while also granting various {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to allies and imposing {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} on enemies. The Grand Strategist can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} on one of these areas. At the start of the Grand Strategist's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each ally who is in the area when this turn begins gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. For every enemy who is killed in the area between when the heroic act is used and when the extra turns begin, the number of AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6). Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les Grands Stratégistes disposent de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} clés classées en {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tactiques de Combat{/g} : {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Ligne de front{/g}, {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Ligne de fond{/g} et {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Zone arrière{/g}. Chacune d'entre elles désigne une zone du champ de bataille qui présentera des interactions spécifiques avec le reste des capacités du Grand Stratégiste, tout en conférant divers {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} aux alliés et en imposant des {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g} aux ennemis. Le Grand Stratégiste peut utiliser son {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} sur l'une de ces zones. Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Grand Stratégiste, chaque allié situé dans la zone bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} et 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. Pour chaque ennemi éliminé dans la zone entre le moment où l'acte héroïque est utilisé et le moment où les tours supplémentaires commencent, le nombre de PA augmente de +1 (jusqu'à un maximum de 3) et le nombre de PD de +2 (jusqu'à un maximum de 6). {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logique{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Technomaîtrise{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Connaissance (Xénos){/g}.

Les Stratèges disposent de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} clés classées en Tactiques de Combat : Ligne de front, Ligne de fond et Zone arrière. Chacune d'entre elles désigne une zone du champ de bataille qui présentera des interactions spécifiques avec le reste des capacités du Stratège, tout en conférant divers {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} aux alliés et en imposant des {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g} aux ennemis. Le Stratège peut utiliser son {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} sur l'une de ces zones. Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Stratège, chaque allié situé dans la zone bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. Pour chaque ennemi éliminé dans la zone entre le moment où l'acte héroïque est utilisé et le moment où les tours supplémentaires commencent, le nombre de PA augmente de +1 (jusqu'à un maximum de 3) et le nombre de PD de +2 (jusqu'à un maximum de 6). {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logique{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Technomaîtrise{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Connaissance (Xénos){/g}.

languages.text: 战略大师的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}包括{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}战斗策略{/g}：{g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}前线区域{/g}、{g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}后线区域{/g}、{g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}后方区域{/g}。每种战斗策略都可以指定战场上的某片区域。目标区域将会与战略大师的其他能力进行互动，从各个方面强化盟友，削弱敌人。 战略大师的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}可以对其中一片区域使用。直到战略大师的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始之前，所有处于目标区域的盟友都会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，拥有1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。 英雄壮举激活之后，盟友获得额外回合之前，目标区域内每有一名敌人死亡，所有盟友获得的行动点数都会提高1点（最多3点），获得的移动点数提高2点（最多6点）。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商业{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}爆破{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}逻辑{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}科技使用{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}知识（帝国）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}知识（异形）{/g}。
languages.original_text: Grand Strategists have a set of keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} categorised as {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g}: {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Frontline{/g}, {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Backline{/g}, and {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Rear{/g}. Each of these designates an area of the battlefield that will have specific interactions with the rest of the Grand Strategist's abilities, while also granting various {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to allies and imposing {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} on enemies. The Grand Strategist can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} on one of these areas. At the start of the Grand Strategist's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each ally who is in the area when this turn begins gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. For every enemy who is killed in the area between when the heroic act is used and when the extra turns begin, the number of AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6). Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}.

traits.locale_text: 战略大师的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}包括战斗策略：前线区域、后线区域、后方区域。每种战斗策略都可以指定战场上的某片区域。目标区域将会与战略大师的其他能力进行互动，从各个方面强化盟友，削弱敌人。 战略大师的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}可以对其中一片区域使用。直到战略大师的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始之前，所有处于目标区域的盟友都会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，拥有1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。 英雄壮举激活之后，盟友获得额外回合之前，目标区域内每有一名敌人死亡，所有盟友获得的行动点数都会提高1点（最多3点），获得的移动点数提高2点（最多6点）。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商业{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}爆破{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}逻辑{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}科技使用{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}知识（帝国）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}知识（异形）{/g}。

languages.text: Los grandes estrategas cuentan con una serie de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} clave que reciben el nombre de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}tácticas de combate{/g}: {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Primera línea{/g}, {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Línea de defensa{/g} y {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Retaguardia{/g}. Cada una de ellas designa un área del campo de batalla que interactuará de manera distinta con el resto de capacidades de los grandes estrategas, así como concederá diversas {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} a los aliados e impondrá {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalizaciones{/g} a los enemigos. Los grandes estrategas pueden utilizar sus {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actos heroicos{/g} en una de estas áreas. Al iniciar el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del gran estratega en cuestión, cada aliado que esté en el área en dicho momento obtiene un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Por cada enemigo que se abata en el área entre la utilización del acto heroico y el inicio de los turnos extra, aumentará el número de PA en +1 (hasta un máximo de 3) y el número de PM en +2 (hasta un máximo de 6). {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características relevantes{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Comercio{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolición{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Lógica{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Uso de tecnología{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Conocimiento (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Conocimiento (xenos){/g}.
languages.original_text: Grand Strategists have a set of keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} categorised as {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g}: {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Frontline{/g}, {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Backline{/g}, and {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Rear{/g}. Each of these designates an area of the battlefield that will have specific interactions with the rest of the Grand Strategist's abilities, while also granting various {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to allies and imposing {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} on enemies. The Grand Strategist can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} on one of these areas. At the start of the Grand Strategist's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each ally who is in the area when this turn begins gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. For every enemy who is killed in the area between when the heroic act is used and when the extra turns begin, the number of AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6). Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los grandes estrategas cuentan con una serie de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} clave que reciben el nombre de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}tácticas de combate{/g}: {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Primera línea{/g}, {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Línea de defensa{/g} y {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Retaguardia{/g}. Cada una de ellas designa un área del campo de batalla que interactuará de manera distinta con el resto de capacidades de los grandes estrategas, así como concederá diversas {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} a los aliados e impondrá {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalizaciones{/g} a los enemigos. Los grandes estrategas pueden utilizar sus {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actos heroicos{/g} en una de estas áreas. Al iniciar el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del gran estratega en cuestión, cada aliado que esté en el área en dicho momento obtiene un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Por cada enemigo que se abata en el área entre la utilización del acto heroico y el inicio de los turnos extra, aumentará el número de PA en +1 (hasta un máximo de 3) y el número de PM en +2 (hasta un máximo de 6). {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características relevantes{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Comercio{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolición{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Lógica{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Uso de tecnología{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Conocimiento (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Conocimiento (xenos){/g}.

languages.original_text: The Strategist has a set of key abilities called Strategic Plan: Forward, Second Line and Rear. All of them allow you to designate functional zones on the battlefield, with which the rest of the strategist's abilities interact, giving various bonuses to allies and penalties to enemies. The strategist's Heroic Act is used on one of the zones. Each ally in that zone gets an extra turn with 1 OD and 2 OP before the Strategist's next turn. For each enemy killed in the same zone, the number of Action Points is increased by 1 to a maximum of 3 and the number of OPs is increased by 2 to a maximum of 6. Important Strategist Traits: Sociability, Intelligence, Perception, Willpower. StrategistSkills: Persuasion, Commerce, Explosive Engineering, Logic, Technique, Knowledge: Imperium, Knowledge: Xenos.

languages.text: 大戦略家の要となる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はセットになっており、{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}軍略{/g}：{g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}前線{/g}、{g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}バックライン{/g}、{g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}後衛{/g}と類別される。これら各々がそれ以外の軍師のアビリティと相互に作用する戦場のエリアを指定し、また仲間に様々な{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}をもたらし、敵には{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を負わせる。 大戦略家はこれらのエリアのいずれかで{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を行使することができる。大戦略家の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時、ターンが開始した時にこれらエリア内にいる味方は各自、{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加のターン{/g}を1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と2{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}とともに獲得する。 英雄的行為が行使された時点と追加ターンが開始された時点の間に倒された敵ごとに、各々APが1（最高3まで）増加、MPが2（最大6まで）増加する。 主要な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商取引{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}デモリション{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}論理{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}技術使用{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}伝承（帝国）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}伝承（異種族）{/g}。
languages.original_text: Grand Strategists have a set of keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} categorised as {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g}: {g|f:7cdf3a1dd3b5477096e008492e738587}Frontline{/g}, {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Backline{/g}, and {g|f:b1e24d15bb6841d89b9873829f7b3ba5}Rear{/g}. Each of these designates an area of the battlefield that will have specific interactions with the rest of the Grand Strategist's abilities, while also granting various {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to allies and imposing {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} on enemies. The Grand Strategist can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} on one of these areas. At the start of the Grand Strategist's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each ally who is in the area when this turn begins gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. For every enemy who is killed in the area between when the heroic act is used and when the extra turns begin, the number of AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6). Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}.

traits.locale_text: 大戦略家の要となる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はセットになっており、軍略：前線、バックライン、後衛と類別される。これら各々がそれ以外の軍師のアビリティと相互に作用する戦場のエリアを指定し、また仲間に様々な{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}をもたらし、敵には{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を負わせる。 大戦略家はこれらのエリアのいずれかで{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を行使することができる。大戦略家の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時、ターンが開始した時にこれらエリア内にいる味方は各自、{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加のターン{/g}を1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と2{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}とともに獲得する。 英雄的行為が行使された時点と追加ターンが開始された時点の間に倒された敵ごとに、各々APが1（最高3まで）増加、MPが2（最大6まで）増加する。 主要な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商取引{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}デモリション{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}論理{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}技術使用{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}伝承（帝国）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}伝承（異種族）{/g}。

At the start of the Grand Strategist's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each ally who is in the area when this turn begins gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. For every enemy who is killed in the area between when the heroic act is used and when the extra turns begin, the number of AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6). Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}.
